ABOUT_KARROT.EXISTING_GROUPS: A few groups already using Karrot

ACTIVITIES.DESCRIPTION: Each activity has a number of slots which members of the group can sign up for – this way everyone knows who goes where and when, and feedback can be given later.
ACTIVITIES.SUBTITLE: Activities with a specific time and place, like meetings, food pickups, community events, or whatever your group needs can be entered in the software.
ACTIVITIES.TITLE: Распределение задач и действий

COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION: Write a message that everyone in the group will see or a private message to someone. Everything related to a single activity or place can be discussed in their respective chats.
COMMUNICATION.TITLE: Общение в верном контексте

DEMOCRATIC.DESCRIPTION: Karrot is made by its users: a free and open-source software developed with the feedback and participation of the people who use it. It is mainly developed by a small core team that is constantly in contact with people in different groups, in order to make sense of their diverging and converging needs and thus guide the development. We abide by the ethics of integrity and non-commercialization of data.
DEMOCRATIC.DESCRIPTION2: Developers and designers are obviously welcome to participate in its development.
DEMOCRATIC.TITLE: Democratic and participative development

GROUPS.DESCRIPTION: Yet they are all displayed on the map so that people can find and connect to other groups in their location and even globally.
GROUPS.SUBTITLE: Every group on Karrot is completely independent and can have their own logo, processes, rules and agreements.
GROUPS.TITLE: Независимые группы

MAPS.DESCRIPTION: You have a map of where the places and the people doing the activities are located. You have a nice list of upcoming activities and can sign up for them online.
MAPS.TITLE: Карты и списки

NOTIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: You get notified about empty activities, new messages and new people wanting to join your group. But you can also turn it all off if you wish more peace!
NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Уведомления

OFFERS.DESCRIPTION: Offers are visible to everyone in the group and people can show their interest on the offer's chat.
OFFERS.SUBTITLE: Create an offer of whatever you want to share or give away.
OFFERS.TITLE: Share things

OPENSOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Everything is transparent and possibly changeable. We encourage groups to host their own instances of the platform, if they have the ability to do so. Still, we also provide access to a hosted version on karrot.world.
OPENSOURCE.TITLE: Open source

TEAM.DESCRIPTION: You can easily talk to the people developing Karrot, either on our {forum}, on {code} or in real-time on our {chat}.
TEAM.TITLE: Ответственная команда

TRANSLATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Karrot is fully translatable by the community and many languages are already added. To contribute more translations just visit the project on {translations}.
TRANSLATIONS.TITLE: Многоязыковой

TRANSPARENCY.DESCRIPTION: The history shows who did what and when. Everything from participating in an activity to creating and editing places is logged here.
TRANSPARENCY.TITLE: Transparency

TRUST.DESCRIPTION: There are no admin superpowers in a Karrot group. People who receive enough trust-carrots from their peers will be able to edit and change settings in the group. When new people want to join your group they need to apply and answer questions your group can set, which anyone with editing rights can decline or approve. Likewise, if there is the need to review someone's membership, the group can enter a voting system to resolve it in a communal way.
TRUST.TITLE: Democratic and trust-based group management

ABOUT_KARROT.SUBTITLE1: Karrot is a free and open-source tool for grassroots initiatives and groups of people that want to coordinate face-to-face activities on a local, autonomous and voluntary basis.
ABOUT_KARROT.SUBTITLE2: It is designed in ways to enable community-building and support a more transparent, democratic and participatory governance of your group.
ABOUT_KARROT.TITLE: Начать группу, основать сообщество
ABOUT_KARROT.VISION_INTRO: Whether you are saving and sharing food, running a free shop or a makerspace, keeping a community garden or a bike-kitchen...

APPLICATION.ACCEPT_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you want to accept {userName} into this group?
APPLICATION.DECLINE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you want to decline the application of {userName}?

INFO.MESSAGE: This is a score voting in which all group members can participate to determine someone's membership.

REQUIREMENTS.NEWCOMER: Before you can start a membership review, you need to receive more trust and gain editing permissions. In the meantime, please ask a fellow group member to start the process for you.

CONFLICT.STEPPER1a: You are about to start a group-wide membership review to decide whether {userName} should continue as a member of the group
CONFLICT.STEPPER1b: This will be open for all group members to participate.
CONFLICT.STEPPER2a: Thank you for caring for your community!
CONFLICT.STEPPER2b: For a group it is important to practise honest communication and address any issues.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3b: This process will start a chat and a vote.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3c: The chat will be visible for all group members and includes {userName}.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3d: The voting is anonymous. It will go on for {votingDuration} days. During this time all voters can change their minds and vote differently as many times as they want.
CONFLICT.STEPPER4a: Please explain why you are starting this process!
CONFLICT.STEPPER4b: Tell your group what made you think this is justified and needed. This statement will be visible to {userName} and group members.

VOTING.HEADLINE: How do you want to proceed with the ongoing membership review of {userName}?

CONFLICT.WITH: This process is to review the membership of {userName}

USERDATA.NEWCOMER_GUIDANCE: {userName}новый пользователь в вашей группе и возможно нуждается в инструкциях.

TRUST_INFO.MESSAGE: Она является частью доверительной системы Karrot. Символ показывает является ли член группы новеньким и как много доверия необходимо пользователю для права редактирования.
